article_title: Candidates talk education, taxes, regulations at West Coast Chamber breakfast

article_metadata.description: As the legislative session comes to a close and summer gets into full swing, campaign season is in the air.A candidate forum at the monthly West Coast Chamber of Commerce governmental affairs breakfast brought out hopefuls in the 26th and 30th state Senate districts as well as 80th, 89th, 90th and 88th House Districts.Almost to a person, candidates listed their priorities as education, taxes and regulations.Tonya Schuitmaker, R-Lawton, has represented the 20th District since 2010, but under
article_metadata.author: Andrea.Goodell @hollandsentinel.com (616) 546-4275
